Join us for an exciting and immersive workshop, "Your First Day in Digital Sculpting with ZBrush," on Monday, September 25th at ITI Knowledge City branch at New Capital.

This workshop is perfect for beginners and enthusiasts eager to dive into digital sculpting and learn the fundamentals of creating a basic 3D character using ZBrush.

๐ The workshop is available for students aged between 14 to 20.
